item.description:
In case just watching the marathon is not enough of a way to celebrate Marathon/Patriots/Tax Day (do your taxes!), come on over to a potluck brunch/pregame! My housemates and I live just 2 blocks from where TMIRCE will be watching the race, so feel free to bounce back and forth between eating/drinking/merriment, and race-watching merriment with your favorite running people. We will provide some as-yet-undetermined brunchy foods, exciting beverages, and sign-making materials, but feel free to bring any/all of the above, as well as friends.

Starts at 9:30, wheelchairs will go by at 10:30, then the first runners a bit after 11:30. Hope to see you all there!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Marathon Monday Brunch/Pregame
